title: Leah's Lousy Day
description: We all have rough days! The important thing is how we choose to react when we get angry. Leah's Lousy Day, is an engaging story of a young girl who finds herself overcome by her anger. When her teacher Ms. King notices that Leah is having a hard day, she offers some helpful advice. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters as well as to identify and use exclamation marks.
meta: calming, frowned, project, scolded, teased, upset
Analyze Character : Analyze characters to understand the text
Exclamation Marks : Recognize and use exclamation marks
